website_summaries.verdict: The design isn't for everyone, but if you have bad wrists or just want extra protection, this set is a great bet.
pros: Stands out for its ultra-compact and balanced design, which even includes a handle for wrist protection
cons: Mastering the weight selection process, which involves sticking the weight pin in correctly, can be challenging

customer_reviews.title: This is BS its only 1 block not 2 or ...
customer_reviews.text: This is BS its only 1 block not 2 or pair, that it states all over the page! This makes it over 300$ heck no! Very misleading they should be ashamed!
customer_reviews.author: chris sickenberger

customer_reviews.title: Where is my other weight? SCAM???
customer_reviews.text: The listing shows 2 weights and that they come as a set. I only received one. I see a lot of people having this issue. At this point I would say this is a scam. The problem is that the box they come in has the word SET marked on it when it’s actually only one dumbbell. Total rip off - no way I would pay $150 bucks for 1 dumbbell. Yep, I returned that heavy butt dumbbell for a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: SkipTryorBuy

customer_reviews.title: I'm the dumbbell
customer_reviews.text: When I read other reviews, some were great and others stated there was only one dumbbell delivered. I read the description carefully and it clearly states the weight of shipping is 50lb. The equivalent of a full set not one dumbbell. Those reviews were correct. I only received one!!! It looked of good quality but only one delivered!!! Thank you Amazon for giving me a refund. Otherwise I would not be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L Patton

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: Only one dumbell was shipped when it’s clearly stated on the advertisement page that it’s a pack of two dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: This feels like a scam
customer_reviews.text: I received only one dumbbell in the shipment when the listing on Amazon clearly says it's a set of two. On digging further I realized that a number of customers have faced the same issue. I urge customers to not fall for this apparent scam and not order this item. And I expect Amazon to look into these repeated mis-deliveries in multiple cases.
customer_reviews.author: baps_333

customer_reviews.title: Description says "Pack of 2/Set/Pair." Only one showed up.
customer_reviews.text: Description clearly says "Pack of 2," "set," and "pair." But only one dumbbell showed up, and the order is logged as delivered. I'm hoping this was a mistake or a case of shipping snafu, but I printed a return label just in case. When the second dumbbell arrives, then this review will be lovingly amended.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: BIG FAIL only received 1 of 2 boxes
customer_reviews.text: I love these adjustable dumbbells. Unfortunately like so many other customers I only received 1 box (1 dumbbell). I should have received 2 boxes = 2 dumbbells for a complete set as advertised. On the box in bold is printed “THIS IS A MULTI BOX SET “ and “2 BOXES = 1 PAIR”. Unfortunately when this order was picked they were not paying attention. I tried to call AMAZON for a resolution at this time but they are not accepting phone calls. I guess I have no other choice but to return and buy directly from the manufacturer as others have done.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.  Difficult to use vs health club weights
customer_reviews.text: 1) only received 1 box with 1 dumbbell, had to have them ship replacement. 2) as a woman I found it to be very large and not easy to use. 3) they were very noisy while using them. I returned them. Unfortunately they needed to be returned in one box. The box weighed 52# and was very unwieldy. I ended up buying a set of regular weights.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Difficult on carpet, love the extra space.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that my wife no longer has dumbbells sitting around everywhere. It takes up WAY less space. I hate the fact that it doesn't work well on carpet. You need to set these weights on a hard surface for the different weights to line up just right. If the weights aren't lined up right you can't safely change the weights. Also, I wish the pin that you pull to change weights was a little stronger. It hasn't broken and I'm probably just being paranoid but I worry that it will cause issues in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SHEFF

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic option for those with little space to devote to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic option for those with little space to devote to fitness equipment! I use mine almost daily and love them. My only complaint is I wish the slides used to change weights were metal. I have had no issues yet (about 2 months of use) but I'm a little worried the plastic could break someday. Also, many people have commented that you can't change weights on carpet. I work out in my carpeted bedroom and have had no problems changing weights on the carpet. Just push down slightly on the handles as you adjust the weight. Works fine for me!
customer_reviews.author: Rfb123

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my set of 24 pound power locks. They were packaged as a set. There is even a lable that states this is a set. Do not separate. So far so good. I completed my first workout. I was able to select between weights with no effort. I have a small workout area and these take up very very little space!!
customer_reviews.author: Msredstar

customer_reviews.title: I like it but I also don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for what I use it for. I use it mainly for at home circuit training when I don't have time for the gym. It's supplemental and not my main set-up. I like that it's easy to use and quick to adjust but j hate how noisy it is during use. It clicks and clacks and can get annoying during use.
customer_reviews.author: Christna Fredrick Kim

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: I like these so much that I flew them to Sweden. I love doing fitness blender workouts and my favorite thing is weight lifting. I moved to Sweden last year on my own dime (so I only brought a few suitcases) and brought these with me in my luggage. They fit well in my 500 square foot apartment. I have used them multiple times a week for 2 years and they're still fine. If I hadn't gotten pregnant in the middle, I might have outgrown them by now, but they're still heavy enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Appleseed

customer_reviews.title: Only received 1!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clearly listed as a set, only received one despite the packaging stating that it was “box 2 of 2” and “deliver as a set.” I needed up getting a partial refund on the set and was able to find a single weight from Walmart so I actually had a set. I use the weights daily and they are great, but I DO NOT recommend buying them off amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Shaner

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: Received only one dumbbell instead of two—they really need to figure this out.
customer_reviews.author: Traecy McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting can be frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Weights take up minimal storage and are easy to transport. The weight range is high and low enough to fit my needs. The colors on the side make it easy to distinguish between weight levels. Only complaint is the plastic weight pin. The prongs are a bit flimsy and sometimes it is difficult to get them to go into the correct slots. Sometimes the prongs will insert themselves into two different weight levels. It seems that PowerBlock could make the prongs of a sturdier material so that they go straight-in, both ends together, instead of flimsing about.
customer_reviews.author: Lorianne O.

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Very practical solution to avoid collecting multiple weights. When used properly, didn't see any issue of falling apart. Markings are clear to pick the desired weight. Does require flat surface to change weights effectively but even then it does take a bit longer than just picking a different set. So it does require some modifications to training routines. I plan my routines into groups of exercises that i will use same weight thru the set to keep the pace and then change the weight as i move to a new set. That’s the only drawback if training while watching a recorded training lessons
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shahaf

customer_reviews.title: Only weights I need!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted these for a long time and finally decided to get them and I dont have any regrets! I just need to be faster at changing the weight to keep up with Daniel and Kelly during the workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis L. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best weights I have ever encountered.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best weights i have ever encountered. Perfect for at home use. Quickly and easily switch between weight amounts for that next set or exercise. I recommend getting the standard to go with it because you are going to want them to be easier to reach and be on a solid flat surface for weight changing. A down side to this model is that it doesn't have an expansion pack. So if you are really trying to get muscle mass. I would say to looking into the models that have that expansion ability. But for toning and endurance without trying to get too big. Then these work out good.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great choice, but Amazon still may only send one the first time.
customer_reviews.text: Switched my workouts home from the gym, and this set has been great, and much more affordable than other options. NOTE:. They still haven't figured out the issue of accidentally only sending 1, so it may take two tries to get the full pair. That's annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Space saving!
customer_reviews.text: I really do enjoy not having to store a bunch of different sized weights by having this set. It’s a bit clumsy feeling at first, and sometimes I have a hard time changing the weight when they’re on carpet versus a hard surface. *Side note: if you order this set of 2 and only receive one, contact Amazon and let them know the box says “1 of 2” or “2 of 2” and you only have one. They will send you the second weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole M.

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: I did receive 2 power blocks which was a relief. But only one of them had the metal base/bottom that they rest in. Not the most serious issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jen DeVer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Yes these things are pretty awesome, they are well made, and they take a fraction of the space of a full set of dumbbells. My only complaint is that i purchased these from Amazon.com, I ordered two pairs and I got three dumbbells!?!? The pair I got, the boxes are taped together, the third one is in a box that clearly says "2 boxes = 1 pair" and yet like so many other people here, they forgot a box. Just be prepared for that happen apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: “Clink, Clank” bicep curls
customer_reviews.text: I Like these weights. They are easy to click to an new setting. Nothing hard about them. BUT, when I do my bisecp curls the “clink”, and all the weight shifts to my arms. And visa versa. And square is kinda odd. I have to put my hand inside a rectangle and work the shape. I’ve gotten used to it. But it is very different than the standard weights.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome dumbbells!!!
customer_reviews.text: I learned about these weights from working out with Fitness Blender. These are amazing! It has the perfect variety and it saves a lot of space. They seem to have been built very sturdy. On one weight I would put it on 18lbs and the 21lbs would come out with it because it was bent in. I went through the exchange process and got a new set in two days and these ones work perfectly. Great customer service! I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: KettleCornwall

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!  Only received one of the dumbbells of a multi-set!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product! I ordered a multi set expecting two dumbbells and only received one! I tried reaching out to the manufacturer and they tossed the blame on Amazon. With this pandemic its been impossible to reach a customer care person to send me an update as to when I can expect the other dumbbell that I paid for already!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my 83 year old dad, who loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a present, along with a stand, for my 83 year old dad, who has lifted his whole life, but can't go to the normal gym due to CV restrictions. He absolutely loves them. They're perfect for him and allow him to keep on with the resistance training at home. He always mentions them when I call. I actually wanted to get him one of the adjustable benches also, but he declined that saying the weights were all he needed.
customer_reviews.author: koleah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, take up very little space!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after I started working out to the Fitness Blender videos. I owned a pair of 5 lbs dumbbells before but quickly realized that just wasn't enough. I wanted something that I could adjust the weight setting instead of buying a whole set of dumbbells that take up a lot of space. These adjustable ones are the answer!! They are very easy to use, easy to handle, and they take up very little space!! I would def. recommend this to anyone who wants to step up on their strength training game, as I do feel this is a very good entry level pair of dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Powerblocks + Fitness Blender = healthy success
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about six months ago and use them ~5 days a week. I LOVE them. Best fitness investment I have ever made. Pair them with fitness blender workouts and I am in the best shape of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Margarida

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING!!!!! AMAZON YOU ARE BETTER THAN THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Product description AT THE VERY TOP says "Pair of adjustable dumbbell weights for efficient, cost-effective strength training" , but make sure you read the legal disclaimer AT THE VERY BOTTOM that states only 1 is included. Let me also add that it references the product as a pair THREE times before the legal disclaimer states that it's only 1 dumbbell. I thought Amazon had higher standards, this is unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my PowerBlocks. I work out a lot at home due to my scheduled and these are a perfect option for getting my strength training in. FitnessBlender an awesome workout channel (YT or fitnessblender.com) also uses these is great because I usually don't have to pause the workouts to change weights. I've wanted these for so long. It has definitely been worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: MsTisha325

customer_reviews.title: Both dumbbells received!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I was concerned about purchasing after reading other reviewers received only one dumbbell. I decided to take a chance because of the price point in comparison with competing brands. We’re satisfied, and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Great/flexible set, received both boxes!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of weights. I was concerned about receiving both boxes after reading some reviews, but thankfully had no issues. I put them to work the next day, and was surprised how sturdy they feel. I’m giving 4 stars because I’d prefer metal over plastic for the pins. I have them on the floor and if you’re not careful you can get them in mismatched holes and stretch them; they still feel sturdy and I wouldn’t expect them to stap unless under abuse. If you’re looking for a great adjustable set, look no further! Not having adjustable dials means less parts to malfunction; these are simple and effective
customer_reviews.author: Michelle/Zak

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only received one of the wieght😣 for that price it should be two of them. Plus it says a pair of wieghts, meaning two! Waste of time 😣
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable weight set!
customer_reviews.text: Love these weights! They are exactly what I need for at home workouts without taking up a lot of space. The more you use them the faster you get at switching between different weights, which is helpful during fast HIIT interval training. The different weight ranges are perfect for what I need and I'll be able to stay with this particular set for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R

customer_reviews.title: Convenient storage of weights
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy storage and the amount of weights. It takes a little learning curve to adjust the weights quickly, but once learned you can easily switch weights while doing a fitness routine.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Jurina III

customer_reviews.title: Great but changing weight setting is a bit clumsy
customer_reviews.text: These are great dumbbells although it took me sometime to get used to changing the weight. It’s a bit clumsy as weight shaming setting is in the side the dumbells and if they are on the floor it’s a bit hard to set them.
customer_reviews.author: YRB4

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Great Quality Adjustable Dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbell weights are really nice and perfect for an in-home workout! They can adjust with taking out the side panel and sliding it in the corresponding color weight. Very simple and easy to adjust the weight. These do only go up to 24 lbs in each dumbbell. But it’s perfect for me to know out more reps and sets then to adding weight.
customer_reviews.author: ATP

customer_reviews.title: I received BOTH. even has labels stating (Sold as a pair)
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of this product because of the disproportionate amount reviews stating they only received 1 of the 2 dumbbells. But the price for an adjustable set of weights was unbeatable (can't beat the free shipping either). The good news is that I DID receive both! And they're smaller than what I had expected which is actually a good thing as I live in an apartment. I'm 5' 11" with what I would say are normal sized hands and they fit inside the bars perfectly. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Turner

customer_reviews.title: received just a single weight not a pair- guess I have to call to figure it out now
customer_reviews.text: received just a single weight not a pair- guess I have to call to figure it out now
customer_reviews.author: Wade Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Power block set
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these and have used them in my workouts. They replaced my old dumbbells and I needed to up my weight anyway. I’m getting the stand and hope that makes it easier to adjust the weight while in working out. Overall great buy for the price IMO!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! The small weight increments are great. I love that I don’t have to fuss with a bunch of small weights in duplicate; I only have to have a few larger weights and these! Not sure why folks are bothered by the fact that these need to be on a flat surface to change weights... how hard is that? They do occasionally make a clinking sound but it’s minimal, not bothersome, and not unsafe. These are an excellent choice for a home gym!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Schuster

customer_reviews.title: I compared these against the Bowflex Seletttech and went with these because of how comfortable they feel when using
customer_reviews.text: I watch FitnessBlender videos and they have these dumbbells. I compared these against the Bowflex Seletttech and went with these because of how comfortable they feel when using. The square shape may throw some people off but I love it. Only issue I had was with shipping - I originally only received one dumbbell but Amazon corrected my issue and ordered me another set. One minor downside is that they can only be correctly changed on a flat surface (not carpet). I had a few issues when trying to change them on the carpet while working out but once I realized it truly needed to be on a flat surface, no issues since. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! So much better than having to buy a bunch of dumbbells and storing them. These adjust on hard surfaces. It’s difficult to adjust on carpet so if you exercise on carpet, I’d use a small table or a board to place these on. They are easy to hold too. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love these weights
customer_reviews.text: We chose these because we follow FitnessBlender on YouTube and they do not disappoint. We wanted a variety of weights that would challenge both my husband and myself, but didn't want to fill our house with dumbbells. This is the perfect solution! The weights are compact, and take up no more room than one set of dumbbells. They are easy to use and switch weights rapidly. The customer service is great - one of the weights was bent, making it difficult to change out, but they replaced the product with no trouble. I definitely recommend for people looking to begin weight training or maintain fitness without converting your entire home into a gym.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Rattle, Loose Feeling
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to adjust these- at times the bars don't align with the slots, resulting in rattling and an unsecured feel. I think this may only be a problem with this set- I've seen other PowerBlocks that work better. Since they don't work quickly and easily, the purpose is defeated and I'll be returning these if I can find the box they were packed in.
customer_reviews.author: AlpineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Functional, space savers.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to try out my new adjustable dumbbells today (YES I DID RECEIVE TWO)... they are awesome. Easy to adjust and a decent grip. They are definitely worth the money considering they are space savers. Plus if you consider the cost of buying each pair of dumbbells equivalent to what this offers: 3lb, 6lb, 9lb, 12lb, 15lb, 18lb, 21lb and 24lb. That adds up quickly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Only supports one way of holding it
customer_reviews.text: If you're only ever going to hold these by the handle in the center, they're great. That's not how my world works. I'm using these for a workout where you have to be able to hold the dumbbell by the outside edges, one "bell" in each hand. This is tricky to do securely with the Power Block, because there's less contour to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: minifig

customer_reviews.title: Space saving. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These weights are very high quality. I love how it's all in one and saves a ton of space. Just make sure it's on a flat surface before trying to change out weights. So glad I have these.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for space saving
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount of weight I can lift without having lots of space taken up. You need to have them set on a hard surface when changing the amount of weight you want otherwise the selector gets crooked because the inner plates won't be lined up. I set mine on a cutting board on the floor because we have carpet. It was a cheap solution and works great. I can now switch the pounds I want in 10 to 15 seconds for both. A wise investment, if you are serious about doing some strenth training. I have had mine over a year and use them several times a week. They are well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Seth S.

customer_reviews.title: These are really great, getting so many weight varieties for this price
customer_reviews.text: These are really great, getting so many weight varieties for this price. I would give it a five star except that the weight sometimes shifts against the pins making them feel loose. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome weights. No regrets on this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They save such an amazing amount of space, but also give me access to what, for me, is an entire gym worth of weights. The ONLY hesitation I have with these is how well the plastic "fork" that selects and holds the weight stacks will hold up. But, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: LBAR

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They're easy to change, don't rattle much, don't seem loose and allow me to lift a larger variety of weight without filling my house with weights. I love Fitness Blender too, they go well together. They have to be aligned properly which isn't always easy, but it's not even kind of hard either.
customer_reviews.author: Corgi

customer_reviews.title: I'm so in love
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I love these, I LOVE these!!!!! So easy to use, so compact, so perfect! I was worried about doing things like over-head extensions, but they don't at all feel cheap like it's going to fall apart while over top your head. The weight is plenty for me, and I know it will keep me challenged. Do be sure that when you put the clip in, it is set to the same weight at both ends and fully clicked in. The manual covers that as well. I love these for my Fitness Blender workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Kbish

customer_reviews.title: Great weights for anyone
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE love love these! They are so perfect. I love how they're multiple weights in one dumbbell so you dont have to have 40 different weights to feel like I got a good workout in. They're super easy to change weights if your following along with a video and they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: DeRiah M.

customer_reviews.title: Great weights, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great item, I'm been debating on purchasing these due to some of the reviews. I went ahead and made the purchase and this is the beat deal around I have found for a set of adjustable weights. They are exactly what I was looking for, great quality they are a SET OF TWO. Buy the weights!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: BOTH boxes arrived together and on time!
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* I've now tried them out and I love them!! Very easy to use. Normally I wouldn't write a review before using the blocks but I wanted to say that I received BOTH sets of dumbbells in the mail, two boxes. I only had one tracking number. Very excited to try them out!
customer_reviews.author: Vie

customer_reviews.title: So much better than multiple sets of weights
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these weights while following a fitness program on YouTube and had to have a set simply because they are so compact and accessible. I am very satisfied with PowerBlock adjustable weights and love that I only need these two blocks and the coordinating compact stand that I purchased with it. I do not have a workout room, so this setup is perfect. The plates are secure when I adjust the pin to change the weight however, I have put the pin in crooked when moving quickly between sets, so you have to pay attention. Otherwise, I like these so much better than having to keep multiple sized weights laying around the house.
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Love these weights!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't often leave product reviews, but these weights are so great that I felt like I owed it to the creators to give a good review. They are great for an apartment, they are easy to use, and they are reasonably priced. I've only had them for a few weeks, but the build quality seems to be good and I can't imagine anything failing on them any time soon. It's not really a drawback, but I would comment that a little bit of care and caution must be used when inserting the "pins" to select a certain weight. If you do it too fast, then sometimes it's not inserted properly. I recommend these weights!
customer_reviews.author: SlowComet

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a month now, after having used traditional hex dumbbells. The ergonomics are good, and my experience is that the plates feel stable during lifts. You do need to place them on a flat, solid surface to change the clip, but that's easily done. I will absolutely purchase a heavier set when I'm ready to increase weight beyond 24lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME alternative to a full set of hand weights!!!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, these are pretty awesome! You can eliminate all of those other hand weights you have (unless you're The Hulk and lift 50's regularly) and get these. The most obvious reason - space. These take up about 1 square foot of floor space versus that times however many sets of weights you have for the others. These are easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM - WOULD BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I have found these to be easy to use if you follow the instructions. Initially had a couple of problems: almost impossible to set correctly when placed on a carpeted area so now placing on a table or counter and needed to make sure the set pins are aligned properly. We have a set of regular dumb bells downstairs so I leave these upstairs and use only them now. Guess others are having some major issues with these, but I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these!! Just like what I see used in FitnessBlender!! Just make sure you keep them on a flat surface while you're trying to switch out from one weight to another (aka not carpet) otherwise it won't lock like as tight as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Cash

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use set of adjustable dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I had been wary of ordering these because of the shipping snafus others had, where only one dumbbell arrived. Thankfully I had no issues with delivery and received the pair. While I will need to use these more to test the durability, so far they are easy to adjust and work very well. I am satisfied with this purchase and look forward to using these for many workouts to come.
customer_reviews.author: Peng Huang

customer_reviews.title: Well made.  No issues.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to lift variable amounts of weights. Never any trouble changing the weight and very easy on the hands and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: K. Henry

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love that these are all i need for my weight ...
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love that these are all i need for my weight lifting. no clue where to put the 2 pairs of dumbbells i already have haha. the only downsides are trying to switch weights in the middle of a workout video (i'll learn how to do this faster with time) and the fact that you absolutely need to switch weights on a flat surface. tried to do it on a carpet but it's a no go for me.
customer_reviews.author: chanzilla

customer_reviews.title: These are great except both pins to change the weights are on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great except both pins to change the weights are on the left side. To be convenient during workout you have to flip 1 upside down to get the pin on the opposite side which makes the numbers upside down. customer_reviews.title: Compact, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I slip them under the bed when I'm not using them. I use them to keep toned as I get older and have trouble with arthritis. Good value compared to others I looked at before buying these, and the quality is better as well.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of dumbbells!!

customer_reviews.author: Breigha Adeyemo

customer_reviews.title: these are quite nice. When I placed my order

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design. You only lift the selected weight not the entire dumbell length without the weight.  Think about it....

product_meta.title: PowerBlock Sport 24 Adjustable Dumbbell, 24 lbs (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description:
PowerBlock sport 24 adjustable dumbbell replaces 8 pairs of dumbbells in the space of just 1 pair. Sport 24 has a weight range of 3-24 lbs. Per hand in 3 lb. increments, replacing 216 lbs. of free weights. Compact design keeps workout space neat & organized. Weight changes take just seconds using a selector pin much like a weight stack machine at the gym. Selector Pin: Simple and efficient. Insert the magnetic polypropylene pin into the slot to select the desired weight. The pin has a 500 lbs. max load. Auto Lock: EXP models have an 'Auto-Lock' to make micro adjustments by reducing the handle weight by 2.5 or 5 lbs. The two 2.5 lbs. inside the tubes at the base of the handle can be removed by pulling on the lever. Bands on the side rails show the weight of the dumbbell selected with the pin. The pin covers the band/rail that's been selected to easily show what the weight is.

AMAZON.COM
The only dumbbell system that can expand to meet your strength needs, PowerBlock dumbbells are the most versatile and effective exercise tool ever developed for strength training. PowerBlocks work intuitively. Rather than requiring you to buy a room full of dumbbells, PowerBlocks act just like a weight stack at the gym, with a weight handle that fits inside the first weight, which fits inside the second, which fits inside the third, etc. When you want to change weights, you simply move the weight selector pin into the appropriate slot and you're set. As you lift the core, all the weights above the selector pin are lifted at the same time, turning your 3-pound dumbbell into a 6-pound dumbbell, or your 6-pound dumbbell into a 12-pound dumbbell. Not only is the system remarkably easy to use, but it's also cost- and space-efficient, as a single pair of dumbbells can do the work of dozens. 

 This pair of SportBlock 24x3 dumbbells, for instance, adjusts from 3 to 24 pounds in 3-pound increments (3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21, and 24 pounds), in effect doing the job of 16 individual weights. Even better, the weights are more compact and balanced than traditional dumbbells, with a padded handle that protects people with weak wrists. Best of all, the free weights are terrific whether you're trying to build muscle mass, firm and tone your physique, or get rid of unwanted body fat. The SportBlock set offers a maximum weight of 24 pounds per hand and carries a limited 10-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Pair of adjustable dumbbell weights for efficient, cost-effective strength training
Adjusts from 3 to 24 pounds in 3-pound increments (3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21, and 24 pounds)
Selector pin lets you change weights easily, just like with weight stack at the gym
More compact and balanced than traditional dumbbells; padded handle for wrist protection. Welded solid steel construction. Powder-coated finish
Offers maximum weight of 24 pounds per hand; limited 10-year warranty
